description: Josh Ireland arrives for his interview. Kyle submits him to similar treatment, using different bondage items, a ball gag, a leather slapper, a cockring and parachute harness and ball weights. When there is a knock at the door, Kyle has Josh wait where he is, then takes the new arrival, Chris Corvid, to another part of the office where Jim, another applicant is already hogtied on a table. Kyle spreadeagles Chris to the wall, gags him, slaps his cock around, slaps him all over his body, then leaves him to wonder what next and goes to get Josh whom he brings in and ties into a chair. Kyle then goes to get Matt, who arrives in an open-mouth gag and bound in a Humane Restraint muff. Kyle locks Matt in a cage.
title: A DAY AT THE OFFICE - Applicant 2: Josh Ireland
